qoute: Advertising is legalized lying.
He who has not a good memory should never take upon himself the trade of lying.
He who is not very strong in memory should not meddle with lying.
A dog teaches a boy fidelity, perseverance, and to turn around three times before lying down.
A wise man does not waste so good a commodity as lying for naught.
All that Mankind has done, thought, gained or been: it is lying as in magic preservation in the pages of books.
Being nice to governments doesn't work, they are such lying bastards.
Curiosity is lying in wait for every secret.
He who observes etiquette but objects to lying is like someone who dresses fashionably but wears no vest.
Health nuts are going to feel stupid someday, lying in hospitals dying of nothing.

Heaven lies about us in our infancy and the world begins lying about us pretty soon afterward.
I do myself a greater injury in lying that I do him of whom I tell a lie.
I do not mind lying but I hate inaccuracy.
I do not mind lying, but I hate inaccuracy.
I have heard say that complimenting is lying.
In plain truth, lying is an accursed vice. We are not men, nor have any other tie upon another, but by our word.
It is more from carelessness about truth than from intentionally lying that there is so much falsehood in the world.
Lovers lying two and two
Lying increases the creative faculties, expands the ego, and lessens the frictions of social contacts.
Lying is a terrible vice, it testifies that one despises God, but fears men.
Lying is the greatest of all sins.
Lying rides upon debt's back.
Lying to ourselves is more deeply ingrained than lying to others.
Next Big Thing - you hear all that crap. I'd be lying if I said I wasn't psyched.
On the plus side, death is one of the few things that can be done just as easily as lying down.
On the plus side, death is one of the few things that can be done just as easily lying down.
One should be just as careful about lying as about telling the truth.
The best liar is he who makes the smallest amount of lying go the longest way.
The happiest part of a man's life is what he passes lying awake in bed in the morning.
The most common lie is that which one lies to himself; lying to others is relatively an exception.
There are a thousand thoughts lying within a man that he does not know till he takes up a pen to write.
There are some people so addicted to exaggeration that they can't tell the truth without lying.
When lying, be emphatic and indignant, thus behaving like your children.
You will not be carried to Heaven lying at ease upon a feather bed.
